name: Watch-phone
body:
# fea 10x3  

[x,y,z] not [mod,minabs,maxabs] window_sz=10

## train testset not overlap


* nn 93.9166666667
* adaboost 0.989606299213
* lr 0.980157480315
* svm 0.991811023622
* rf 0.993385826772

# fea4x3  

[xyz] 10x3 -> 4x3   |10:windowsize,  4:[mean std min max] for 10x1

## not ensemble 
* nn 98.4
* adaboost 0.993543307087
* lr 0.984881889764
* svm 0.993700787402
* rf 0.995748031496

## ensemble
try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.981496062992 min max 0.972440944882 0.992125984252
